title: Loving Hut - Claremont
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Pizza, Organic, Fast food, Take-out, Asian, Vietnamese
description: Part of international chain of vegan restaurants inspired by Supreme Master Ching Hai, an advocate for veg living. Each location is individually owned and operated. Its motto is "Be Veg, Go Green 2 Save the Planet." NOTE: This Loving Hut branch started a project called Go-Green Community Build up, where you can join a loyalty customer rewarding plan and receive membership rewarding plan. For more details call and ask for Charles.
streetAddress: 175 N Indian Hill Blvd Building A 102
